title: Animation Channel
description: Targets an animation's sampler at a node's property.

sampler.description: The index of a sampler in this animation used to compute the value for the target.
sampler.gltf_detailedDescription: The index of a sampler in this animation used to compute the value for the target, e.g., a node's translation, rotation, or scale (TRS).

target.description: The index of the node and TRS property to target.
